job_tasks.phrase: ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer je ook nieuwe baanbrekende AI-modellen en oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core task of designing, developing, and implementing AI models and solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: zoals Large Language Models (LLM's) in combinatie met Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions Large Language Models (LLMs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), which are key components of GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: verzekeringsprofessionals te helpen om snel en effectief grote hoeveelheden data te verwerken, waaronder polissen, claims, rapporten, e-mails, PDF's, afbeeldingen en andere vormen van digitale informatie.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the task of processing large amounts of diverse data, which is a fundamental aspect of data engineering for AI/ML.

job_tasks.phrase: onderdeel van een ambitieus Feature Team dat gespecialiseerd is in het bouwen van innovatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the role is part of a team building AI solutions, implying integration into a larger product or feature set.

job_tasks.phrase: werkt aan geavanceerde technologieÃ«n zoals Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML) en Deep Learning (DL).
job_tasks.justification: While NLP, ML, and DL are AI concepts, the context of 'working on' them within a feature team suggests their integration into software products.

job_tasks.phrase: werkt nauw samen met jouw team aan het optimaliseren van prestaties, verhogen van schaalbaarheid en het realiseren van tastbare resultaten die impact hebben.
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing performance, increasing scalability, and delivering tangible results are core software engineering tasks, applied here to AI solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met jouw team
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states collaboration with the team.
Highlights the innovative aspect of the solutions being built.
Indicates a drive and ambition for the work.

soft_skills.phrase: passie voor technologie, AI en Data Science
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a strong interest and drive to learn and engage with the field.

soft_skills.phrase: complexe data omzetten naar waardevolle inzichten
soft_skills.justification: Describes the process of solving problems by transforming complex data into insights.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to both core software engineering (building solutions, optimizing performance, scalability) and GenAI specialization (designing/developing AI models, LLMs, RAG, processing large datasets). The emphasis on LLMs and RAG, combined with the development of AI models, points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile. The role involves building and integrating these AI solutions within a feature team, indicating a balance between the two macro-categories.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the technologies (LLM, RAG) and the tasks involved (developing AI models, processing data, optimizing performance, scalability). The language used directly maps to the definitions in the coding book, making the classification straightforward.
